item.description:
On Thursdays, a group of us gets together for breakfast and a hike. Sometimes we hike in Myles Standish. Sometimes we go on one of the AMC hikes. Sometimes we just eat breakfast when it's pouring.

I'm putting this up this week because I see the AMC hike is scheduled to do the same Crowe to Crowe loop in Dennis that they've done 3 times in the last 2 months. It's a pretty hike-- but there are other places in and around Myles Standish just as pretty.

Let's come up with something closer. Any suggestions? I'll post the location for the hike part (which would start at about 10AM) if we can come to an agreement.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club
